publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2126 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motionâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee reports to the Justice 1 Committee by 7 January 2005 on the draft Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Act 2004 (Incidental, Supplemental and Consequential Provisions) Order 2005.
